channel.title: Help for RS privat Server
channel.description:
Hii,
It may be that something is wrong in the text around, I'm German and not prop wollts nen text make it difficult to translate, so I took the Google translator.
So: Will issues like I can now create a runescape private server, so what should I do first, and then how do I edit the map, or determine the price for the armor.
LG Engelz :|

item.title: Help for RS privat Server
item.dc:creator: @ry60003333 ry60003333
item.description:
@ry60003333 wrote:

You have to actually follow them for it to work! Go through the tutorial step by step and follow every direction, then the server will work.

Also, make sure to search for an answer to a common question before posting.

Read full topic

item.title: Help for RS privat Server
item.dc:creator: @sexy_slay sexy slay
item.description:
@sexy_slay wrote:

I’d advice that you read through the tutorial section, to get the basics of coding runescape private servers. Im sure that you will get the hang of it, just read those tuts, download a source, and post specific help topics to what you need help with.
